name: Chaikin Oscillator Analysis
question: Which stocks are showing Chaikin Oscillator accumulation or distribution signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are being accumulated or sold off?
description: Analyzes Chaikin Oscillator to identify accumulation and distribution phases based on Accumulation/Distribution Line momentum. Detects bullish signals when oscillator crosses above zero and bearish signals when crossing below zero, with divergence analysis.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Chaikin Oscillator analysis
Step 2: Get historical price and volume data for Chaikin Oscillator calculation
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for accumulation/distribution signals
Step 4: Calculate Chaikin Oscillator and identify accumulation/distribution crossover signals
Step 5: Rank stocks by Chaikin signal strength and accumulation/distribution phase
